sentences.sentence: He was my inspiration when I was a boy a worrier to look up to.
sentences.translation: 祖父令人敬仰的发愁者。当我是个小孩子时。

sentences.sentence: Fussy, a worrier, overcritical, harsh, perfectionist and conservative.
sentences.translation: 太过吹毛求疵，唠叨琐碎，杞人忧天，追求完美，思想保守。

sentences.sentence: Many of the participants were something of a worrier throughout their life.
sentences.translation: 许多参与者在他们一生中都担忧。
